name: Professor Wallace Dyer
traits: Cautious, meticulous, and deeply skeptical of anything that cannot be documented.
motivation: To preserve an accurate and rational account of human history.
secret: He possesses a small, untranslatable fragment of a text he believes predates any known human civilization. It terrifies him, and he keeps it locked in a safe, refusing to show it to anyone.
hook: The investigators are researching ancient history or trying to authenticate a historical artifact.
